official_title: A bill to impose a moratorium for one year on the deregulation of railroad boxcar traffic by the Interstate Commerce Commission.

summary.text: Imposes a moratorium for one year after the date of enactment of this Act on the deregulation of railroad boxcar traffic by the Interstate Commerce Commission.

titles.title: A bill to impose a moratorium for one year on the deregulation of railroad boxcar traffic by the Interstate Commerce Commission.
